listitem.para: Only relevant if the source is a directory.

If a directory being backed up - either the directory given as SOURCE or any subdirectory of it - contains a file called .copyback-filter, then rsync reads include/exlude filters from it. Include/exclude filters tells which files are include or exclude in the backup.
Filters from a .simback-filter file are applied to files in the directory containing the file and subdirectories of it.
Preserve most attributes of files and directories.
Preserve the executability mode of files.
Preserve "ACL"s of files (if there are any).
Preserve "extended attributes" of files (if there are any).
